course_description: This course introduces the physical therapy student to management of diagnoses that are unique to women. This course will explore conditions that are specific to women, including an introduction to pelvic health. Learning methods will involve a combination of lecture, lab and small group discussion. Topics to be explored include: Pregnancy, Postpartum, Pelvic Pain Conditions, Bladder Dysfunction, Bowel Dysfunction, Breast Cancer, Menopause, The Female Athlete, Orthopedic - Pelvic Connections.
